summary: ‘Game of Thrones’ star Jason Momoa and more to host ‘SNL’ in December
title: ‘Game of Thrones’ star Jason Momoa and more to host ‘SNL’ in December
body:
Image: warner bros.

Aquaman will visit land just long enough to host Saturday Night Live in December. Actor Jason Momoa was announced Monday as one of the show’s forthcoming hosts, along with Claire Foy and Matt Damon.

SEE ALSO: ‘Saturday Night Live’ goes completely off the rails during ‘Space Thanksgiving’

Early present for you. 🎁#SNL pic.twitter.com/gwfSdqP76f

— Saturday Night Live – SNL (@nbcsnl) November 26, 2018

This is the first time hosting for both Foy and Momoa, and Damon’s first hosting gig since 2002 (though he did appear earlier this season as Brett Kavanaugh). The first-time hosts have a lot in common, including fall movies (First Man, Aquaman) and popular TV shows (The Queen, Game of Thrones). 

Anderson .Paak will also play SNL for the first time, while Mumford & Sons will return for a third appearance on the heels of a new album. Veteran guest Miley Cyrus will team up with Mark Ronson this time around.

SNL returns Dec. 1

WATCH: Jason Momoa is getting in shape for Justice League

Read more: https://mashable.com/article/snl-jason-momoa-claire-foy-matt-damon/

The post ‘Game of Thrones’ star Jason Momoa and more to host ‘SNL’ in December appeared first on Viral TV News.



from WordPress http://www.viraltvnews.com/game_of_thrones/game-of-thrones-star-jason-momoa-and-more-to-host-snl-in-december/

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary: hey annoying who’s listening. i’m thinking about reading the game of thrones series. i own them all and i tried reading them a...
body: hey annoying who’s listening. i’m thinking about reading the game of thrones series. i own them all and i tried reading them a couple years ago but i couldn’t get into them. so now i’ve watched the show and now i’m rewatching the show. there’s so many interesting theories and stories in the books. i know they are deep and detailed. so i’ll get to my point now does anyone have any suggestions on how to approach them. id love any tips or tricks.

blog.name: artofthrones
blog.title: The Art of Ice and Fire
blog.description:
Game of Thrones/A Song of Ice and Fire Art Blog, None of these are original works.  If you re-blog from here, keep the artist's credits within your re-blog! Background and Avatar by the excellent Prokrik.

Spoilers in some pictures! Be wary, I'm not responsible for your discoveries!

Use the home link, or the orange top right X to navigate back home. 

Use the search or the image tags to find your favorite houses/characters. "HLS4" for histories and lore of season 4.

title: [Spoilers] Ned vs Tywin
body:
Ned and Tywin were both heads to large families, and they had a very different approach to their role. I think an interesting point is that at first glance it may seem easy to take Tywin’s side on this and see Ned as a naive idealist, as it does seem like Tywin’s methods are winning in the game of thrones.

But then both die, and Tywin’s mistake becomes apparent. What Tywin missed is that all of his empire was built on him. And once he was dead, it collapsed. His family turns on each other and his dream of 1000 year dynasty goes to ashes. Where’s Ned naive ideals continue to live on in his children.



Source: https://ift.tt/2EyH0p9

blog.name: afandomofthrones
blog.title: A Fandom of Thrones
blog.description: Sarah, 25, Bi, Canadian. I like Fandoms and things. Current Obsession: ASoIaF.

tags: send me asks and i shall answer
summary: 6, 10, 26 and 27 for asoiaf or riverdale or any other fandom you want!! :D
question: 6, 10, 26 and 27 for asoiaf or riverdale or any other fandom you want!! :D
answer:
Thanks, Joana!! I’m gonna try to answer each question for both fandoms, just for you!!

6. Has Fandom ever made you enjoy a pairing you previously hated?

Technically there are not many ships I actually hate (mostly just ones that gross me out), but there are some ships I never thought of before and the fandom made me love

Asoiaf- Years ago when I started getting into the fandom for the first time, I met someone who told me about Robert/Lyanna and I fell in love with them and it changed my whole world, and I shipped them alone for a long time until a bunch of others started realizing how adorable those two are. So it was more of a single person rather than the fandom I guess. But something the fandom did change my mind on is Gendry and Arya, I had a hard time shipping them at first because I saw Arya as a child and so it felt wrong to ship her at all, but eventually the fandom convinced me how adorable they are, especially because they are like Robert and Lyanna reincarnated soooooo I love it.

Riverdale- to be honest I didnt really ship anyone in this show until you (Joana) showed me the light and introduced me to alice and fp. But again, I didnt actually hate them before .

10. Most disliked arc? Why?

Asoiaf- Depends on show or book, the show I could go on for ages about all the arcs I hate. In particular I’m not a fan of the Daenerys/Jon storyline . Or the Rhaegar stuff (especially the depiction of lyanna and rhaegar, no one can convince me THAT is a love story) which I’m sure everyone knows that already 😂 In the books, there are a few arcs that bored me while reading, but looking back there are a lot of things that I love or are important from most arcs. But I guess if I had to choose then I wasn’t a fan of the Iron Born chapters, besides Asha, really just Aeron and Victarion bugged me.

Riverdale- I honestly cant think of anything really. Maybe the whole Archie in jail thing, I’m just sort of waiting for that to be over so he can get back to the others. (I need to catch up still too)

26. Most shippable Character?

Asoiaf- Oh I can ship Elia with alot of people because I just think she deserves love, and Sansa too. I mean Elia/Ashara, Elia/Arthur, Sansa/Margaery, Sansa/Willas, there are just so many. Those two are very shippable.

Riverdale- I couldn’t really say. Mostly because I havent gotten too invested in too many ships yet. It will happen soon though, I’m sure.

26. Least shippable character?

Asoiaf- I have a hard time shipping characters who are horrible and who’s relationships would all be terribly unhealthy. So like Joffrey for example, I cant ship anyone with him because he’s a psychopath. As much as I love writing angst and pain, I like to know that a ship has the ability to be happy at some point. So personally the least shippable characters are the worst characters, Joffrey, Ramsay, Rhaegar, Cersei, Baelish etc. (Which doesnt necessarily mean I dont like their characters, I think they are very well written characters but they are bad people and anyone else in the ship would deserve better)

Riverdale- Again this one is hard because I haven’t become super invested in many ships yet, and so I haven’t found one character that I dislike shipping. So I don’t know, maybe just the characters I don’t know well enough yet? (Archie also kind of bugs me sometimes but I don’t know why. )

[Thanks Joana!! This was fun!!]

Riverdale- I honestly cant think of anything really. Maybe the whole Archie in jail thing, I’m just sort of waiting for that to be over so he can get back to the others. (I need to catch up still too)

26. Most shippable Character?

Asoiaf- Oh I can ship Elia with alot of people because I just think she deserves love, and Sansa too. I mean Elia/Ashara, Elia/Arthur, Sansa/Margaery, Sansa/Willas, there are just so many. Those two are very shippable.

Riverdale- I couldn’t really say. Mostly because I havent gotten too invested in too many ships yet. It will happen soon though, I’m sure.

26. Least shippable character?

Asoiaf- I have a hard time shipping characters who are horrible and who’s relationships would all be terribly unhealthy. So like Joffrey for example, I cant ship anyone with him because he’s a psychopath. As much as I love writing angst and pain, I like to know that a ship has the ability to be happy at some point. So personally the least shippable characters are the worst characters, Joffrey, Ramsay, Rhaegar, Cersei, Baelish etc. (Which doesnt necessarily mean I dont like their characters, I think they are very well written characters but they are bad people and anyone else in the ship would deserve better)

Riverdale- Again this one is hard because I haven’t become super invested in many ships yet, and so I haven’t found one character that I dislike shipping. So I don’t know, maybe just the characters I don’t know well enough yet? (Archie also kind of bugs me sometimes but I don’t know why. )

[Thanks Joana!! This was fun!!]
trail.content:
Thanks, Joana!! I’m gonna try to answer each question for both fandoms, just for you!!

6. Has Fandom ever made you enjoy a pairing you previously hated?

Technically there are not many ships I actually hate (mostly just ones that gross me out), but there are some ships I never thought of before and the fandom made me love

Asoiaf- Years ago when I started getting into the fandom for the first time, I met someone who told me about Robert/Lyanna and I fell in love with them and it changed my whole world, and I shipped them alone for a long time until a bunch of others started realizing how adorable those two are. So it was more of a single person rather than the fandom I guess. But something the fandom did change my mind on is Gendry and Arya, I had a hard time shipping them at first because I saw Arya as a child and so it felt wrong to ship her at all, but eventually the fandom convinced me how adorable they are, especially because they are like Robert and Lyanna reincarnated soooooo I love it.

Riverdale- to be honest I didnt really ship anyone in this show until you (Joana) showed me the light and introduced me to alice and fp. But again, I didnt actually hate them before .

10. Most disliked arc? Why?

Asoiaf- Depends on show or book, the show I could go on for ages about all the arcs I hate. In particular I’m not a fan of the Daenerys/Jon storyline . Or the Rhaegar stuff (especially the depiction of lyanna and rhaegar, no one can convince me THAT is a love story) which I’m sure everyone knows that already 😂 In the books, there are a few arcs that bored me while reading, but looking back there are a lot of things that I love or are important from most arcs. But I guess if I had to choose then I wasn’t a fan of the Iron Born chapters, besides Asha, really just Aeron and Victarion bugged me.

Riverdale- I honestly cant think of anything really. Maybe the whole Archie in jail thing, I’m just sort of waiting for that to be over so he can get back to the others. (I need to catch up still too)

26. Most shippable Character?

Asoiaf- Oh I can ship Elia with alot of people because I just think she deserves love, and Sansa too. I mean Elia/Ashara, Elia/Arthur, Sansa/Margaery, Sansa/Willas, there are just so many. Those two are very shippable.

Riverdale- I couldn’t really say. Mostly because I havent gotten too invested in too many ships yet. It will happen soon though, I’m sure.

26. Least shippable character?

Asoiaf- I have a hard time shipping characters who are horrible and who’s relationships would all be terribly unhealthy. So like Joffrey for example, I cant ship anyone with him because he’s a psychopath. As much as I love writing angst and pain, I like to know that a ship has the ability to be happy at some point. So personally the least shippable characters are the worst characters, Joffrey, Ramsay, Rhaegar, Cersei, Baelish etc. (Which doesnt necessarily mean I dont like their characters, I think they are very well written characters but they are bad people and anyone else in the ship would deserve better)

Riverdale- Again this one is hard because I haven’t become super invested in many ships yet, and so I haven’t found one character that I dislike shipping. So I don’t know, maybe just the characters I don’t know well enough yet? (Archie also kind of bugs me sometimes but I don’t know why. )

[Thanks Joana!! This was fun!!]

blog.name: too-much-jonerys
blog.title: Jonerys Side Blog
blog.description:
Main Blog: lareinadecorazones.tumblr.com

Ao3: ReinaWritesStuff

CURRENTLY A GAME OF THRONES SEASON 8 NEGATIVITY BLOG. This is my Jonerys side blog, so my shipping fuckery doesn't disrupt my non-shipper/GoT followers because Jonerys is my life force now. I want to post and reblog in peace. NOTE: This blog is Gendarya, Team Dragonstone-friendly. This blog is NOT J*nsa-friendly or supportive of Jon or Dany's past romantic pairings. I don't actively hate on them on here in public. But, I will not post anything about them either.

body:
Change my mind

I feel no sympathy or pity for Robert Baratheon because he would’ve cheated on Lyanna with a bunch of women anyway.
